status.name: Resolved

wesm closed pull request #2383: ARROW-2999: [Python] Disable ASV runs in Travis CI for now
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2383
 
 
   

This is a PR merged from a forked repository.
As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:

As this is a foreign pull request (from a fork), the diff is supplied
below (as it won't show otherwise due to GitHub magic):

diff --git a/.travis.yml b/.travis.yml
index a1f56994be..6ecce82047 100644
--- a/.travis.yml
+++ b/.travis.yml
@@ -56,11 +56,12 @@ matrix:
     - ARROW_TRAVIS_ORC=1
     - ARROW_TRAVIS_CLANG_FORMAT=1
     - ARROW_TRAVIS_COVERAGE=1
-    - ARROW_TRAVIS_PYTHON_BENCHMARKS=1
     - ARROW_TRAVIS_PYTHON_DOCS=1
     - ARROW_BUILD_WARNING_LEVEL=CHECKIN
     - ARROW_TRAVIS_PYTHON_JVM=1
     - ARROW_TRAVIS_JAVA_BUILD_ONLY=1
+    # ARROW-2999 Benchmarks are disabled in Travis CI for the time being
+    # - ARROW_TRAVIS_PYTHON_BENCHMARKS=1
     - CC="clang-6.0"
     - CXX="clang++-6.0"
     before_script:


 

----------------------------------------------------------------

users@infra.apache.org

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: I suggest we devise another way to make sure the benchmarks do not bitrot.
fields.summary: [Python] Do not run ASV benchmarks in every Travis CI build to improve runtimes

comments.body: Indeed, it seems the benchmarking step takes at least 6 minutes.
